text.section: In this section, "Office" means the Office of Health Care Quality in the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
The Office may inspect a nursing staff agency to verify compliance with this subtitle.

When the Office conducts an inspection, the Office shall verify that the nursing personnel referred by the nursing staff agency:
If registered nurses or licensed practical nurses, are licensed by the Board; or
If certified nursing assistants, are certified by the Board.
The Office may inspect a nursing staff agency upon receiving a complaint, and may give notice of the inspection to the nursing staff agency.
